name: unacclimatized
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not having changed to suit different conditions of life, weather, etc.: We were unacclimatized to the tropical heat. The soliders had only just arrived in the region and were still unacclimatised. Related word
acclimatize
More examplesFewer examplesHeat exhaustion is more likely to affect people who are unacclimatized.We live at sea level and are unacclimatised to altitude.She had just arrived from New Zealand and was unacclimatized to the London traffic.
